lead_paragraph: The Dallas Mavericks signed the All-Star forward Dirk Nowitzki to a contract extension. Nowitzki, 28, averaged a career-high 26.6 points as the Mavericks advanced to the N.B.A. finals for the first time. Terms of the deal were not disclosed.
